title: toffee bananas
description: James Martin proves you're never too old for bananas and ice cream with this two-in-one recipe for adults and kids.
ingredients: 2 scoops good-quality ready-made vanilla ice cream
1 ripe banana, peeled and cut in half lengthways
50ml/2fl oz ready-made vanilla custard, plus extra to serve
2 scoops good-quality ready-made vanilla ice cream
